attributes.action: Create Legislation whereby ALL  foriegn vehicles entering and leaving the UK are required to carry ALL forms of identification and insurance and create a database on entry and exit. This infomation would make them more accountable for fines etc. which are currently ignored.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present UK HGV's are required to carry ALL forms of identification and insurance whilst travelling out of the UK. We are also liable to INSTANT fines for any number of minor infractions of the laws which very often are obscure and locally generated. My proposal is that ALL FOREIGN Vehicles be made to comply with this requirement and thus prevent blatent evasion and disregard for legal statutes required of UK drivers. Also an entry toll levy to be paid as we do in EU countries for using the roads.
